messageBody:
At 12:25 PM 31/08/01, you wrote:

>Hello,
>
>Was wondering if there exists a JUnit extension that allows JUnit to run
>tests every x minutes (every eg 30 minutes).
>Preferable this would run in a JUnit GUI like junit.swingui.TestRunner,
>but with the option to check-enable repeatative testing, and specify an
>interval like every x minutes.
>
>Repeatative testing is interesting to check a development that depends on
>several dependancies (legacy applications) that tend to change over time
>(eg go down, be modified, etc)
>
>I experimented to implement/extend junit.swingui.TestRunner but without a
>lot of success so far.



cron on *nix, or a Scheduled Task on Win* would be easiest way to go...
